name: The fiery plate of Underworld
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a good amount.
It has awesome armour class for its type (excellent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration unnoticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration unnoticably.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
